title: Robots Configuration
description: Configuration schema for robots.json. This schema enforces the structure required by RobotsJson.java

competitionPin.description: DIO pin number for competition robot selector switch. Use -1 to disable. Negative value disables competition mode.

robots.description: Map of robot configurations, keyed by robot directory name (e.g., 'basic_robot', 'baby_swerve')

robotIdentity.title: Robot Identity Configuration
robotIdentity.description: Configuration for a single robot identity (matches RobotIdentity.java)

id.description: Unique identifier for the robot. Can be a MAC address (format: XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX) or any unique string identifier

robotClass.description: Fully qualified Java class name for the robot (must extend GenericRobot). Example: 'frc.robot.example.ExampleRobot'

simulate.description: Whether this robot should be used in simulation mode

competition.description: Whether this robot should be used when competition pin is active
